name: Dual Doors of Knox
entries: These dual doors where wielded by a fire giant dread naught who *hated* doors. he hated them so much that he ripped the seal off a cloud giant hoard room and used them are his shields.

+2 magic weapon AND +2 shield. You must be wielding both items to gain their benefits. {@dice 2d6} bludgeoning, cast {@spell knock|PHB} once per LR, can target up to 9th level magics that are considered "locking" or "sealing".
Paired. Paired weapons has special features that only activate when you are wielding two of the same weapon with the paired property.
